text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Health care facility" has the meaning stated in § 19-114 of the Health - General Article.
"Health care provider" means a person licensed or authorized to practice a health occupation.

"Physician" means an individual who:
is licensed to practice medicine in the State; or
lawfully practices medicine without a license under § 14-302(1) through (4) of the Health Occupations Article.
"Practice medicine" has the meaning stated in § 14-101 of the Health Occupations Article.
"Society" means the Medical Mutual Liability Insurance Society of Maryland.
"Surplus" does not include debt of the Society incurred in accordance with § 3-116(a)(1) of this article to enable it to comply with a surplus requirement.
